original_text: Let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed when he cometh out of his mother's womb.
korean_text: 그가 살이 반이나 썩어 모태로부터 죽어서 나온 자 같이 되지 않게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Let her not be as one dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 죽은 자와 같이 되지 않게 하소서

sentences.original_text: of whom the flesh is half consumed
when he cometh out of his mother's womb
